name: 🍪 v1.Pod wait forever
content:
#TODOs : copy paste Linux and Win (shortcuts + buttons) + change name/ change namespace (shortcuts + monaco right click) 
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  namespace: default
  name: myname
spec:
  containers:
  - name: busybox
    image: busybox:latest
    command: [ '/bin/bash', '-c', '--' ]
    args: [ 'while true; do sleep 30; done;' ]
